structure.unit: ARTICLE XV. DEPARTMENT OF PLANNING, DEVELOPMENT AND REGULATION

text.section:
Sec. 2-108. Same—Duties.
The Planning Advisory Board shall perform such duties as are conferred on it by this article and shall hold at least one (1) meeting a month to review the work of the Planning and Zoning Director and to consider such matters as may be referred to it by the Director or the County Commission.
